short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate selected text on the screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the ultimate language translation browser extension, designed to simplify the process of translating text on the fly! With this innovative tool, users can effortlessly select any text on the screen and instantly translate it to a supported language, eliminating the need for tedious typing or manual translation. A convenient shortcut button is available for quick access, allowing users to seamlessly translate text without interrupting their workflow. Whether for personal or professional use, this extension is perfect for individuals who frequently interact with foreign languages, providing a seamless and efficient way to communicate across linguistic boundaries.
